name: READ DESCRIPTION - Closedverse With Nintendo Font
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
A Closedverse theme that uses the font on the Wii U. If it doesn't work the first time, you probably don't have the font installed, so here ya go:
additional_info:
3/30/18 - Still in some sort of beta. I'm pretty new to this so I'm not sure if this will work or not. It's public domain so you can improve it yourself if you want.
A few minutes later - Never mind, this works perfectly. You can still add on to it if you really want to.
7/19/18 - Oasis support! Now you can use this with Oasis because this theme is now compatible with an supports Oasis! If you use Oasis, you can use this theme!
8/10/18 - It wasn't working for some reason. It should be fixed now.
